reviewText: Fabulous. And a beautiful rewrite of the myth.

A Surprise with a play within a play within a play. I loved the staging and the narrations that each character played in the micro and macro of this story. The points of view kept shifting, making the story even stronger. A fresh way to see/hear a classic.
A poetic spirit suggestive of Cocteau's "Orphe" morphed into a quite different take on the myth. Late Alain Renais. Impeccable cinema.
